_sText:
This map has 15 questions. Each question has its own room. Each question has 4 options to choose from. If you fail to answer a question right, you'll meet a surprise. If you manage to go through a right answer, you'll be teleported to a new question. At the end, there is a room with a pool, music player, and a cash machine.

4-16 players are recommeneded, otherwise players might get stuck when teleporting.

Have fun!
